Title: Relates to the entitlement to unpaid leave of absence for victims of domestic violence
Summary: Provides for unpaid leave of absence for victims of domestic violence; permits victims of domestic violence to take an unpaid leave of absence for twenty days from employment to address on-going domestic violence; defines "address on-going domestic violence"; contains provision to protect the individual's job position and benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the entitlement to unpaid leave of absence from employment for victims of domestic violence
